email.title: Thought Machine: The Breakfast Show
email.text:
![tm](https://i.imgur.com/8CHH569.png)
Join Luke and Lorenzo from Thought Machine for a crazy night of fun and madness. You'll be in with a chance of winning some mystery prizes - from the wonderful to the downright weird. You can also hear about Thought Machine, what it's like to work here and how we're making the world of banking less terrible.
* Join Zoom Meeting: https://zoom.us/j/96830783335?pwd=MnJkeEozVS9Rc3ZiY0k1WkxKdHZwQT09
* Meeting ID: `968 3078 3335`
* Passcode: `izg690`
